description: Well, sell and sell. Why mumbling to?
Prototype of the shooting tower. When fires, it releases a napalm clot that deals damage to a single target.
Catkind has long been hypnotized with the so-called "Laser pointer". By increasing the power of this ray, we will bring the hell.
The scientists had a question. What if you launch the projectile up instead of forward? The answer was this machine of pure war.
"Some people think that asking for help is a sign of weakness. This is stupidity and stubbornness. No matter how strong you are, allies make you stronger" © catptain Shepard
The more fire, the more destruction!
The main thing is not lasers. The main thing is their number!
There are never many boxes. Especially THIS kind of boxes.
Shoot, reload and shoot again. Make them regret the day they were born.
Add some refractive lenses. Paint a couple of walls. And look. A new way to decompose them into pieces.
Once the muzzle was filled with 2 cartridges. What did you think? Yes, the old tower exploded. But now the new tower does not have this drawback. Right?
Send rays of good to everyone around us ;)
